metadata.title: TEST
metadata.desction: KrbRelayUp - a universal no fix local privilege escalation in windows domain environments where LDAP signing is not enforced (the default settings). Rule ID: 4506fdde-d36a-4711-b795-3b1c9488b01e Author: SOC Prime Team, SBousseaden . License: https:\/\/github.com\/Neo23x0\/sigma\/blob\/master\/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md. Reference: https:\/\/tdm.socprime.com\/tdm\/info\/
metadata.query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4624" AND winlog.event_data.AuthenticationPackageName:"Kerberos" AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:"3" AND source.ip:"127.0.0.1" AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserSid:*\-500)

query_string.query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4624" AND winlog.event_data.AuthenticationPackageName:"Kerberos" AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:"3" AND source.ip:"127.0.0.1" AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserSid:*\-500)

email.subject: Sigma Rule 'Possible Local Privilege Escalation via KrbRelayUp Tool (via audit)'
